entry.title: Dunwich Farms v12
entry.content:
Dunwich Farms v12 for PlayStation 4 is now available!

  • Removed extraneous craft items
  • Converted bunker pillar to new static
  • Removed rogue floor item
  • Added crashed vertibird
  • Added art icon to Strongleaf
  • Added Strongleaf to workbench food array
  • Fixed issue where Barnacle Meat and Glowing Sea Blossoms were spawning incorrect items in workbench

Thanks for downloading!
entry.summary: Dunwich Farms v12 for PlayStation 4 is now available!

entry.title: Dunwich Farms v11
entry.content:
Dunwich Farms v11 for PlayStation 4 is now available!

  • Fixed issue with MaxHP on Gorilla Panic and Budz Bunny Slims in survival mode

Thanks for downloading!
entry.summary: Dunwich Farms v11 for PlayStation 4 is now available!

entry.title: Dunwich Farms v10
entry.content:
Dunwich Farms v10 for PlayStation 4 is now available!

  • Fixed wood on Grinning Brahmin box
  • Blunt and cigar recipes now craft the proper amount
  • Fixed MaxHP effect
  • Adjusted values on Strongleaf
  • Added description text to all Painkillers
  • Added recipes to Lighters

Thanks for downloading!
entry.summary: Dunwich Farms v10 for PlayStation 4 is now available!

entry.title: Dunwich Farms v9
entry.content:
Dunwich Farms v9 for PlayStation 4 is now available!

  • Removed QA scrap container from bunker
  • Added recipes to constructible objects

Thanks for downloading!
entry.summary: Dunwich Farms v9 for PlayStation 4 is now available!

entry.title: Dunwich Farms v8
entry.content:
Dunwich Farms v8 for PlayStation 4 is now available!

  • Fixed burn effects on Purple Haze and Turbo Killer
  • Fixed changelog
  • Fixed Survival Mode scaling issue
  • Tweaked some numbers on a few other effects

Thanks for downloading!
entry.summary: Dunwich Farms v8 for PlayStation 4 is now available!

entry.title: Remote Cabin Mod Review by Norespawns
entry.content:
Friend of the community and settlement building senpai Norespawns has made a very fine video about Remote Cabin!

Be sure to stop by his YouTube channel and say hello!

Thanks for watching!
entry.summary: Friend of the community and settlement building senpai Norespawns has made a very fine video about Remote Cabin!

entry.title: Dunwich Farms v7
entry.content:
Dunwich Farms v7 for PlayStation 4 is now available!

  • Changed Painkillers to be MaxHP based instead of Damage-over-Time
  • Adjusted Frenzy effect on Bad Mothafucka
  • Moved Lighters into Lighter Gift Boxes and their Perk is now applied when box is opened
  • Lighters can only be crafted one time now as they're unique
  • Moved Fusion Core drain effect to Major Good Vibes

Thanks for downloading!
entry.summary: Dunwich Farms v7 for PlayStation 4 is now available!

entry.title: Dunwich Farms v6
entry.content:
Dunwich Farms v6 for PlayStation 4 is now available!

  • Added Atom Cats, Brotherhood, Bunker Hill, Diamond City, Dunwich Farms, Goodneighbor, Institute, Libertalia, Minutemen, Railroad and Remote Cabin lighters

Thanks for downloading!
entry.summary: Dunwich Farms v6 for PlayStation 4 is now available!

entry.title: Dunwich Farms v5
entry.content:
Dunwich Farms v5 for PlayStation 4 is now available!

  • Added smoking, jet, needle and additional worship mats
  • Added lectern worship idle furniture
  • Added lectern scavenging station
  • Added furniture and workstation blueprints
  • Added blueprints workbench
  • Added Gorilla Panic, Grinning Brahmin and Purple Haze blunts
  • Added Bad Mothafucka, Nuclear Wintergreen and Rad Apple cigarettes
  • Added Budz Buddy Slims, El Duderino, Major Good Vibes and Three Dog Special joints
  • Added Blisstex, Fukitol, Turbo Killer and Wild Berry Numb-Numbs painkillers
  • Added Green Jewel Chew, Snuffout and Yaogaui Dark chaw
  • Added Barnacle Scramble food

Thanks for downloading!
entry.summary: Dunwich Farms v5 for PlayStation 4 is now available!

entry.title: Remote Cabin v23
entry.content:
Remote Cabin v23 for PS4 is now available!

  • Renamed Atomic Warhead to Dirty Warhead
  • Added Ice Cold Rum and Nuka-Cola
  • Added Gin
  • Renamed Cocktails to Hooch
  • Renamed Speakeasy to Top Shelf
  • Renamed Poisoned Wine to Grimwine
  • Added Caffeination effect to drinks that use Nuka-Cola
  • Tweaked a few recipes for current drinks
  • Moved Nightcrawler to Hooch tier
  • Increased proc chance on Spiked Lurknog to 25%
  • Moved Dirty Warhead to Top Shelf
  • Added Blueprints workbench to garage
  • Adjusted AO markers
  • Added AO markers to garage
  • Fixed up garage lights
  • Moved Christmas tree to Port-A-Diner area
  • Moved some build items from Experimental to Furniture
  • Added light switches to garage
  • Removed and consolidated a few lights
  • Added happiness to cat and dog mats
  • Adjusted happiness on other mats
entry.summary: Remote Cabin v23 for PS4 is now available!

entry.title: Dunwich Farms v4
entry.content:
Dunwich Farms v4 for PS4 is now available!

  • Initial implementation of greenhouse
  • Expanded build area to include greenhouse
  • Added Horticulture Workbench
  • Added tractor, lawnmower and refrigerator scavenging stations
  • Added tractor, till, lawnmower and refrigerator idle furniture
  • Added Atom's Glow area
  • Cleaned up navmesh
  • Flattened some of the heightmap
entry.summary: Dunwich Farms v4 for PS4 is now available!

entry.title: Remote Cabin v22
entry.content:
Remote Cabin v22 for PS4 is now available!

  • Replaced destructible crates in power armor garage with statics
  • Added Holiday drinks
  • Added Atomic Warhead drink
  • Added Christmas mode
  • Rearranged Booze Bench categories
  • Moved Booze Bench Mini to corner of cabin
entry.summary: Remote Cabin v22 for PS4 is now available!

entry.title: Dunwich Farms v2

Dunwich Farms v2 for PS4 is now available!

  • Changed Barnacle Meat mesh to "canned meat"

entry.title: Remote Cabin v21
entry.content:
Remote Cabin v21 for PS4 is now available!

  • Added Bobrov's Best Moonshine recipe (requires visiting Diamond City first)
  • Adjusted height on Coffee Stand umbrella
  • Adjusted height on Builder's Note spawn
  • Added Minutemen, Brotherhood of Steel and Railroad "trophies"
  • Converted Institute trophy to "IsJoined"
  • Moved trophy Activators to cover entire cabin porch
  • Slight revision of story holotape
entry.summary: Remote Cabin v21 for PS4 is now available!

entry.title: Remote Cabin v20
entry.content:
Remote Cabin v20 for PS4 is now available!

  • Added note next to front door
  • Added collision planes to prevent Workbench access before zoning
  • Removed "What's New" and note about version 15
  • Adjusted Chem Storage and Halloween activators
  • Added some dust and sand decals
entry.summary: Remote Cabin v20 for PS4 is now available!

entry.title: Remote Cabin v19
entry.content:
Remote Cabin v19 for PS4 is now available!

  • Fixed Pepper Mill issue with Bloody Mary
  • Shortened description text for Workbench Clutter
  • Adjusted lightboxes in settler cabin
  • Adjusted dog interaction marker on Dog Mattress Single
  • Lowered floating tree next to settler cabin
  • Added "Furniture Discussion" to terminal
  • Flattened terrain slightly outside power armor garage doors
entry.summary: Remote Cabin v19 for PS4 is now available!

entry.title: Remote Cabin v18
entry.content:
Remote Cabin v18 for PS4 is now available!

  • Adjusted interaction point for Dog Bed Single
  • Cleaned up stacking and other keywords for current Booze
  • Added Coffee effect for Main Cabin desk activator
  • Added more keywords to Armor Storage
  • Added Poisoned Merlot
  • Fixed an issue where the Coffee Activator was applying the Smoking Effect
  • Added Bloody Mary
  • Added doors to power armor garage
  • Replaced cabin mats with dog and cat mats
  • Plugged a few holes in navmesh
  • Relinked and finalized navmesh in all 9 cells
  • Added drinking fountain spell to garage water cooler
  • Removed QAScrap container and Settler Spawn button
entry.summary: Remote Cabin v18 for PS4 is now available!

entry.title: Dunwich Builders Website Launched
entry.content:
Dunwich Builders now has a website!

Currently the site offers links to mods the team has published, the team's presence on social networks and information about the team members. Future plans include publishing open source code and alternative methods to install mods for PC users.
entry.summary: Dunwich Builders now has a website!

entry.title: Remote Cabin v17
entry.content:
Remote Cabin v17 for PS4 is now available!

  • Added CloudStorage for Mods, Ammo, Melee Weapons and Grenades in Main Cabin and Garage
  • Added CloudStorage for some Armors
  • Added CloudStorage activators for Workshop Trunk and Scrap Shelf in Garage
  • Added Syringer, RadAway and Stealth Boy to Chem CloudStorage
  • Added Mirelurk Eggs, Moldy Food, Perfectly Preserved Pie and Deezer's Lemonade to Cryo Cooler food list
  • Set main cabin Terminal to "Ignored By Sandbox" since it's slightly off-height
  • Added Dog Mattresses, Dog Chair, Couch and Stool, Guard Chairs, Partying and Partied Out Mats, Dog and Cat Rugs and Junk and Booze Shop Chairs as craftable objects
  • Reordered some of the Remote Cabin items in the build menu
  • Converted more static items to scrap
  • Cleaned up navmesh a bit around central rocks
  • Relinked and finalized navmesh for entire settlement
  • Removed Fernweed
entry.summary: Remote Cabin v17 for PS4 is now available!
